name: Loot Simulator
description:
Tired of working for all that sweet, sweet loot in games? Ever wish you could just have it handed to you? Well, look no further!

Loot Simulator is a positive feedback loop and joke prototype that endlessly spawns chests for you to open and revel in for free. 

Created over a couple of weeks to brush up on Unity and C# skills, it's in enough of a finished state to release. Enjoy?
